content.heading: Page Title
paragraphs: Every web page needs a <title> element to describe its purpose.

content.heading: The <title> Element
paragraphs: The <title> element sets the page title, displayed in the browser's title bar, favorites, and search engine results.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>HTML Tutorial</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    The content of the document...
  </body>
</html>

content.heading: Effective Titles
paragraphs: A good title is accurate, meaningful, and enhances search engine optimization (SEO) by helping search engines rank the page.
